output_list.reason: The 'generateTokens' function does not check for overflow, allowing the owner to set the balance of any user to any value, causing an integer overflow.
The 'freeze' function does not check for overflow, allowing the controller to set the frozen amount for any user to any value, causing an integer overflow.
The 'unFreeze' function does not check for overflow, allowing the owner to set the frozen amount for any user to any value, causing an integer overflow.
The 'changeAirdropTotalQty' function does not check for overflow, allowing the controller to set the airdropTotalQty to any value, causing an integer overflow.
The 'receiveApproval' function does not perform any validation, allowing any contract to call approveAndCall and transfer tokens from the caller.
